channel.title: Behavior-Driven-Development on Peter Warnock
channel.description: Recent content in Behavior-Driven-Development on Peter Warnock

item.title: Godog - BDD Testing Framework for Go
item.description: Godog is a Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) testing framework for Go that enables writing human-readable tests using Gherkin syntax, bridging the gap between technical and business stakeholders.
